titleStmt.title: The court of the Gentiles: or A discourse touching the original of human literature, both philologie and philosophie, from the Scriptures, and Jewish church in order to a demonstration, of 1. The perfection of Gods vvord, and church light. 2: The imperfection of natures light, and mischief of vain pholosophie. 3. The right use of human learning, and especially sound philosophie. / By T.G.
titleStmt.author: Gale, Theophilus, 1628-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Hen: Hall for Tho: Gilbert,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Huntington Library.
Includes bibliographical references in marginal notes.
